text: Matilda Tao or Tao Ching-ying () is a Taiwanese singer, television host and author. Tao graduated from National Chengchi University. In 2005, she married Taiwanese actor Lee Lee-zen.陶晶莹李李仁摸屁股传情 上节目庆结婚3周年 网易娱乐 September 12, 2008 ==Hosting== ===Variety show=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Year !!
